column5: I'm currently in the midst of a reno nightmare and need some help. I want to install a small 2pc. bathroom in my basement and need someone to run the water lines and install a drain for me. It's directly below the upstairs bathroom so everything is right there, should be fairly easy for someone who knows what they're doing. Looking for someone who'll work for cash and do it fast (I need it done yesterday  ). Before I start leafing through the yellow pages I figured I'd try here first you never know eh?
Hey Solo, I will give my buddy a call. I dont know if he wants any more work though. But I will try for ya. He's in Burlington so its nice and close
My sons and I would do it for ya if you were a little closer Good luck.

If you are still looking? I can probably help you out next week. Running water lines will be easy but is there a rough-in for the drain? The only solution would be a saniflo type pumping toilet or a jack hammer to open up the floor.
